description: A series of mysterious thefts have left the coastal town of Nice in turmoil. As the sun sets, shadows dance along the Promenade des Anglais, where secrets linger. Your task is to uncover the truth behind the thefts, connecting the dots between the suspects and their hidden motives. Each clue you gather will lead you closer to the mastermind behind this intricate web of deception.
